info.name: SGtools Adblock Extreme!  1.2
info.description:
Removes ads on SGtools that use the !important flag. Somehow I managed to block these ads, even though inline !important cannot be overridden.
My Patreon My Other Styles
info.additionalInfo:
1.2: Fixed issue on info/whitelisted and giveaways/dashboard.
1.1: Finding missed ads on info/whitelisted and giveaways/dashboard.
1.1: Top ad is still linking at multiple-wins.
1.1: Ported to Combo!
1.1: Fixed last bundled page.
1.0: Issue with http://www.sgtools.info/lastbundled and Game Name.
